statements: SELECT * FROM malware_blacklist;
SELECT entity_name, detection_method FROM malware_blacklist WHERE detection_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM malware_blacklist WHERE entity_id = 100;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM malware_blacklist ORDER BY entity_name DESC;
SELECT entity_name, detection_method FROM malware_blacklist WHERE detection_method LIKE '%signature%';
SELECT * FROM malware_blacklist WHERE entity_name='CryptoLocker'
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM malware_blacklist WHERE detection_method='Signature-based' ORDER BY detection_date DESC
SELECT entity_name, detection_method FROM malware_blacklist WHERE detection_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM malware_blacklist WHERE detection_method='Behavior-based' ORDER BY entity_name ASC
SELECT entity_id, entity_name, detection_method, detection_date FROM malware_blacklist WHERE entity_id < 100
SELECT * FROM malware_entities;
SELECT entity_name, description FROM malware_entities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT detection_method, entity_name FROM malware_entities WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM malware_blacklist ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT entity_name, detection_location FROM malware_entities JOIN malware_blacklist ON malware_entities.id = malware_blacklist.entity_id;
SELECT id, entity_name, detection_method FROM malware_entities;
SELECT * FROM malware_blacklist WHERE detection_location='USA' ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT entity_name, description FROM malware_entities WHERE detection_method='signature-based' AND id < 10;
SELECT * FROM malware_entities JOIN malware_blacklist ON malware_entities.id = malware_blacklist.entity_id;
SELECT id, entity_name, detection_method FROM malware_entities WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM malware_entities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM malware_entities ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT type FROM malware_blacklist;
SELECT * FROM detection_logs WHERE malware_id = 5 ORDER BY detection_time ASC;
SELECT name, type FROM malware_blacklist WHERE description LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT id, name, description FROM malware_entities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM detection_logs WHERE malware_id = 5 ORDER BY detection_time DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM malware_entities WHERE name LIKE 'Wanna%';
SELECT * FROM malware_blacklist WHERE type = 'Trojan' LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, description FROM malware_entities ORDER BY id ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareEntities;
SELECT id, name, type FROM MalwareEntities ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, type, description FROM MalwareEntities WHERE type='Ransomware';
SELECT id, name, type FROM MalwareEntities WHERE type='Virus' OR type='Worm';
SELECT id, name, type FROM MalwareEntities WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM MalwareEntities;
SELECT name, type FROM MalwareEntities WHERE type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT * FROM MalwareEntities WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT m.id, m.name, COUNT(ms.id) AS num_signatures FROM MalwareEntities m LEFT JOIN MalwareSignatures ms ON m.id = ms.malware_id GROUP BY m.id, m.name ORDER BY num_signatures DESC;
SELECT mr.report, me.name FROM MalwareReports mr JOIN MalwareEntities me ON mr.malware_id = me.id;
SELECT * FROM malware_entities;
SELECT entity_name, threat_level FROM malware_entities ORDER BY threat_level DESC;
SELECT description FROM malware_entities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT log_id, detection_time, detection_result FROM detection_logs WHERE entity_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM detection_statistics WHERE total_detected_entities > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM malware_entities WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT entity_name, description FROM malware_entities WHERE entity_name LIKE 'malware%';
SELECT * FROM detection_logs WHERE detection_result = 'Detected' ORDER BY detection_time DESC;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM detection_rules WHERE rule_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE blacklisted_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY blacklisted_at ASC;
